metadata.title: CVE-2019-12067 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The ahci_commit_buf function in ide/ahci.c in QEMU allows attackers tocause a denial of service (NULL dereference) when the command header'ad->cur_cmd' is null.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
